text: Hey team, looking to work with Peyton Stewart for Queen Fine Foods. Budget is approx $4,675 - need 3 x 90-second product demo, 2 x Lifestyle photography, 2 x Twitter post, 2 x Instagram reel. 4 weeks exclusivity, 6 month engagement. Usage: 8 months. Start date: January 2026. Need to sort out: TBC on final dates
